tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerInteractions (
  interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Customer_Interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(100),
    interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Customer_Communications (
    communication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    communication_date DATE,
    communication_type VARCHAR(100),
    communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_id INT,
    communication_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_type VARCHAR(20),
    communication_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Communications (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication_date TIMESTAMP,
  content TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Queries (
  query_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  query_text TEXT,
  query_result TEXT,
  query_date TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_name VARCHAR(50),
  user_role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
    communication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_id INT NOT NULL,
    communication_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    order_date DATE,
    order_quantity INT
);
